name: Sharpen
flavor: Sharpen the edge of a material.

purposeDescriptions.low: etches a material into being slightly sharper
purposeDescriptions.mid: etches a material into razor sharpness
purposeDescriptions.high: etches a material into mono-molecular sharpness
purposeDescriptions.invLow: dulls a material into a butter knife
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: cracks and smooths edges into nothing
